name: Australian Sea Diorama
description:
Controls :

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

Left-click - Interact

Shift - Increase Movement Speed

Escape - Instructions and Nightview Option

Octonaut inspired diorama, not real octonaut game.

This Diorama is made through the shared assets provided by Jaydon, Madison, Wan lin, Rachel, Hong Lam, Iqsura, Johnson, Han Tao, Sophie, Fatimah, Jennifer, Ioni, Nick, Noah, Wen Tao and Tristan.

Please ask me to link any of your itch accounts if you see this. (People listed above.)
